dormitory.title: Basic Triple
dormitory.description: Triple occupancy in the Kaufmann buildings. Shared bathrooms with a mix of twin and bunk beds.

basic.title: Basic Double
basic.description: Double occupancy in the Elm buildings. Shared bathrooms with a mix of twin and bunk beds.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: Double occupancy in Maple, Blue Heron, or Cedar. Rooms have queen and twin beds with bathrooms shared between two rooms.

plus.title: Standard Plus
plus.description: Double occupancy in our Scheuer, Pine, Weinberg & May buildings. Rooms have private bathrooms, with a mix of queen and twin beds.

camper.title: Camper
camper.description: Bring your own tent, sleeping bag, and towel. Includes all meals, programming, and access to bathrooms and hot showers.

commuter.title: Commuter
commuter.description: Includes all meals and programming. Does not include any overnight lodging.

online_connection.title: Digital Connection
online_connection.description: Participate in JMR32 from home via our Digital Connection option.
